website_summaries.verdict: This gym-style weight tree is plated for durability and was designed for stabilization.
pros: Six storage posts are chrome-plated, so they will not chip or scratch
Post end caps help align weights
Curved floor stabilizers enhance stability and durability
Measures 26.5” L x 22” W x 41.5” H. 33 lbs
cons: Some bars may not fully fit in holders

customer_reviews.title: This plate rack is NICE. It’s very solid and holds my bar and ...
customer_reviews.text: This plate rack is NICE. It’s very solid and holds my bar and my plates. It was packaged perfectly and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingMrsW

customer_reviews.title: Great weight plate storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to save money and I found this tree. I am impressed after putting it together and loading it down with over 500lbs between weights and the storage of 2 bars. The bar storage really added value! I’m very happy with this weight tree and I give it 5 stars all around! Great way to store plates and bars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Weight Tree! Top Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: This weight tree lived up to all the 5 star reviews. Outstanding quality, easy to assemble and looks like a piece of professional gym equipment. Can hold all the weights as advertised and the chrome covered sleeves make it very easy to remove and add weights back on rack. I have owned a few other weight trees and can personally attest this is one of, if not the best out there. The fact that it can hold 2 Olympic weight bars adds to its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Cyclist

customer_reviews.title: The best free weight plates rack.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 different free weight plate racks. This one is the best. What I like: Three chrome plated bars installed through the trunk and created 6 level posts. it's very easy to load and unload plates. The posts have a perfect distance for storing 25lb, 35lb, and 45lb. no space wasted. 2 holes on the base can stores 2" bars vertically. What I don't like: Will have to report later when I find one.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: great product and service
customer_reviews.text: ***Update**** Emailed customer support that is listed on the inside of the instructions. They confirmed some information and shipping address very pleased with how prompt the service was and how sturdy the rack is. Would purchase again. How can reach the distributor? I am missing the screw set that is supposed to come with the package? The box was a little beat up, but all the pieces look fine. Just missing the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: High quality, rock solid stand with capacity to store 2 Olympic bars and all the weights most of us will ever need. Tall with relatively small foot print, if aesthetics are important to you this looks way better than all the others. A well designed, impressive piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Litefever

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rugged Weight Tree with Small Footprint
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this weight tree would be ok given the lower price compared to high-end equipment. I am not disappointed. It was very easy to put together. It is plenty rugged. It takes up little floor space compared to other trees. It works perfectly for our small home gym. The two barbell holders are an added bonus. I highly recommend this weight tree for your Olympic weights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Photos do not do this justice.
customer_reviews.text: The photos don’t do this rack justice. It is very heavy duty, very stable and well built. Bigger and heavier duty than I thought which is a good thing. I’ve got the standard 310lb Olympic set hanging on this plus some extra 5’s and 10’s and it is rock solid. I highly recommend this rack. Very glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Crowder

customer_reviews.title: There is a small broken cap on top
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good, study, attractive, functional. But, the cap at top is broken, I hope there is a contact company that can send me a replacement for cap on top of weight tree. Who can I contact for this replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Robert M C.

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and 80 percent assembled
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and simple to put together. I will never buy any fitness products from anyone else their products come 80 percent assembled and higher end steel,bolts etc. seriously they even include the tools. This weight tree all u have to do is add the feet.
customer_reviews.author: law0472

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment! However, both of the sleeves that make the connection to the support legs/feet were beat in. Fortunately I have 480 (big) channel locks so I was able to bend them square and feed the feet into the sleeve. Haven’t put any weight on it but it feels really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and tidy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly and it seems strong. I have 4x45s, 4x35s, 4x25s, 4x10s, 4x5s and the bar.
customer_reviews.author: tb

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $$$!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. I like that it has to two bar holders. Nice rubber on the bottom, so it won't mark up your floor. Much better than any others, such as Cap in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Somboplayer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very robust. Half the price of some comparable brands (I paid $99). And much better looking than the options at the same price point.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This weight tree holds up well. I haven't put many plates on it yet, so I do not know the threshold. However, for the modest about of weight I have on it now it works great (150 - 225 pounds).
customer_reviews.author: Rondle

customer_reviews.title: Great weight plate tree
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this home weight plate tree. Assembly was simple. It looks good and is very sturdy. Price excellent for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This rack is fantastic, worth every penny. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. I love and recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: So impressed with the quality and sturdiness of this weight tree. Simple to assemble and rock solid. At this price point you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: mb18264

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.  Solid rack.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous plate holder. No spacing issues, solid, does not wobble, and has enough space. The footprint is very good without compromising stability. A strong recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Massaro

customer_reviews.title: This is one of my best buys ever
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, easy to put together extremely durable and fits in tight spots while holding a good amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bradley

customer_reviews.title: great.
customer_reviews.text: I mean... it holds weights really well.. not much else to say. Easy to assemble, solid. However, with my rack I am going to put pegs to hold weights for my barbells in the rack. I will use this now for a separate dumbbell set of weights.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duffey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Feels very stable and heavy duty. Easy to assemble and not a huge footprint. Holds many plates with no concern.
customer_reviews.author: andrewsaunders

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Box came a little damaged and also was missing hardware that’s why I gave it 4 starts but service to send hardware was quick and it arrived in two days. Holds all my weights. Best value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeysen Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Really well above my expectations. Product was well built and instructions and setup were a breeze
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie234

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Sturdy, Organizes Weight Plates and Bars!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and Heavy Duty. Holds over 20 plates and two Olympic Bars. Simple to Assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product at a Reasonable Price...
customer_reviews.text: took me about 10 minutes to open box and put it together. Excellent fit and finish and very well engineered for its intended use. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. One of my end caps was busted and I called the manufacturer and they sent me a new one asap. Great customer service. Great quality weight stand. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Lovio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Would not pass up on this. Easy to assemble, holds weights, verry sturdy, Light enough to easily move around when completed.
customer_reviews.author: Espi17

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weight Tree
customer_reviews.text: This Fitness Reality Weight Tree is being used everyday at our gym and it is very sturdy and solid. The upright build reduces wasted space. I would recommend this product to anyone that needs to put Olympic weights on a storage rack.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo 450

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy and stable. Definitely great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good support for weights
customer_reviews.text: Put together in 20 minutes alone! Sets up nice, holds a lot of weight and looks good and clean in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Works well at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well at a great price, holds two rows of bumper plates and two barbells securely.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Good rack at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This rack has worked out pretty well. I've got a few hundred lbs of weight on it and it seems pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C.

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy this again! Worth every penny. I have almost 400lbs of weights and 1 bar on it and it really helped clean up my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: ben campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Assemble (About 20 Min) and Holds alot of plates and 2 bars. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ford

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR SO GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: I do not have barbells, so I can't comment on the barbell holders, but, for my Olympic weights this works great. Also, didn't take long to assemble, all tools provided. Nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great tree would highly recommend if you are in the market for a tree!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Seems like a good quality! It did scratch a little when assembling but I don't mind because it's just for my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Grillz9909

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT addition to our home gym! Solid, assembled easily, and the 45s clear the floor.
customer_reviews.author: bookfreak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Construction, Solid, and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent construction, solid, sturdy and stable. Smart design with reinforced welds on thick steal that required only minimal assembly. The directions were easy to follow, but not really needed. Surprisingly, they even included a wrench.
customer_reviews.author: DC Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: A must have for home gyms
customer_reviews.text: Quality steel, assembles fast, hasnt tipped over. Mine currently holds 435lbs of plates and showing no sign of weakness.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Barberino

customer_reviews.title: Weight bars are for 2 inch holes
customer_reviews.text: I rated it as a 5 star as the quality of materials seemed very good. I had to return it as the weight bars are for weights with 2 inch holes... our weights have the smaller 1 inch holes. My mistake..
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Really like it!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Really like everything about this weight tree. Very happy with the purchase. My 14 year old son put it together after school and said it was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: MarkC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This weight stand is a great buy at a great price. Its very sturdy and can hold all the weight as advertised. I'm ordering two more for my home gym. It was easy to put together. Overall excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyMiss1216

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice compact solid unit. Helped me clean up my workout area. It holds my straight and easy curl bar really well. It arrived with no damage to the box too.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Built to last!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic addition to our home gym! Loaded it up with over 600lbs and two Olympic Bars, and it's as SOLID as if it were part of the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, compact.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, fits all my 45s. If I would estimate, I would say it can store 10 45s on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: trey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great that it fits bar and 2 inch Olympic weights
customer_reviews.author: L.T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It only took me less than 30 min to unpack and complete the assembles. Set it up in the garage and placed all the plates on it. I found it pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: HsinYing

customer_reviews.title: This weight tree is amazing. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This weight tree is amazing. Easy to put together, and pretty compact. Well designed and so far no issues after a few months of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: It wobbles quite excessively. But when I put the weights on there it seems to hold up well. I feel as if I laid a little bit more than I should have. It’s literally dropshipped from alibaba
customer_reviews.author: samer helmandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home gym
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality, beefy, easy to assemble and looks great! And it arrived about a week earlier than the original estimate. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Don't get a cheap cruddy Gold's rack, this is what you want. Looks great, super stable, easy build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and helps keep the place clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Leo de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: solid and well made, help to get my excercise area organized--love it
customer_reviews.author: Patrick AZ

customer_reviews.title: Olympic Weight Stand
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Well made and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: vRod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is as good as advertised. I am happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and can be assembled in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and can be assembled in minutes. Very stable and looks great - comparable to something you would see in a commercial fitness center.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home gyms!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and holds all the weight I need it to hold in a compact space. I love that it has cylinders to store other bars like an EZ curl bar.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Great weight tree
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer for all of my weights. I love the two barbell holders as well. Very solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great weight rack!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic weight rack! Easily put together and holds everything steady. Easy to pull the weights off and put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Otis

customer_reviews.title: item is damaged and cant find a number to call for help
customer_reviews.text: item is damaged and cant find a number to call for help
customer_reviews.author: imDaJuggernaut9

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It works great - easy to assemble, very sturdy, and all the plates fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Service

customer_reviews.title: Mistake
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT SEND TWO WEIGHT PACKAGES! I ONLY WANT ONE
customer_reviews.author: John Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very stable, good quality, very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product- easy and fast to put together, well-packaged, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Missing nuts and bolts
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any nuts or bolts to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Queener

customer_reviews.title: sent without hardware. now I have to be inconvenienced ...
customer_reviews.text: sent without hardware. now I have to be inconvenienced and figure out how to close up this box that's bolted with huge staples. returning ! but probably ordering again, because I don't have another option with the 2 bar holders :-(
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Weight Tree arrived defective and Fitness Reality is impossible to get ahold of.
customer_reviews.text: Weight Tree arrived defective and Fitness Reality is impossible to get ahold of. The weight horn screws were stripped upon arrival. I submitted a warranty part replacement order and have not heard a response in over a week. I have attempted to call the offices each day for the last week and not a single person has picked up after a 30 minute hold each time. The weight tree does not allow two olympic barbells to fit. The design of the weight tree is to angle the weights towards one of the olympic barbell holders, thus not allowing the barbell to fit as it hits the angled part of the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

product_meta.title: Fitness Reality Olympic Weight Tree/Plate Rack/Bar Holders/Chrome Storage Posts, 1000 lb
product_meta.description: Fitness Reality. Real people. Real results! looking for a heavy duty weight Tree to keep your plates off the floor brand name internal X-Class Olympic weight Tree is your perfect choice. Designed with 2" x 3" powder coated steel frame construction, the X-Class weight Tree can support 1,000lbs of Real weight plate capacity. It comes with 6 chrome storage posts with 2" x 8" each, and two 2" wide Olympic bar holders. Backed by a limited lifetime warranty, you will never be concerned about storing your weights again. So train hard and get the results you want with the help of the X-Class Olympic weight Tree. Additional info: all storage posts are chrome plated so they will not chip or scratch like other painted bars. Storage posts have post caps that help align the plates as they loaded. All plates are suspended off the floor. Stable design so the weight Tree will not tip or fall over. Curved floor stabilizers enhance stability and durability. Weight plates and bars not included. Assembly required. Set up dimensions: 26.5" L x 22" W x 41.5" h. Set up weight: 33 lbs. Limited lifetime warranty
feature_bullets: 1000 lbs of real weight plate capacity. 2" x 3" powder coated steel frame construction.
6 storage posts with 2" x 8" each. All storage posts are chrome plated so they will not chip or Scratch like other painted bars
Storage posts have post caps that help align the plates as they loaded
Weight tree holds two 2 inch wide Olympic bars. Weight plates and bars not included
Curved floor stabilizers enhance stability and durability. Stable design so the weight tree will not tip or Fall over
